name: Manish Kumar
aboutMe: I'm a UI Designer/Front End Developer. A Microsoft Certified Specialist in Programming in HTML5 with JavaScript and CSS3. I enjoy taking complex problems and turn them in elegant User Experience design.
summary: Microsoft Certified Professional and Microsoft Certified Specialist (Programming in HTML5 with JavaScript & CSS3).
2.5 years of extensive hands-on experience in web development.
Experienced team player with excellent communication, interpersonal skills, and ability to work independently.
Leading a team of 4 members for last 1.5 years.

experience.name: Quality Dashboard
experience.description: This is a web based system for monitoring the quality of various layers of an application.It provides all the information required by the quality team in a single nutshell. This reduced the extensive mail chains for getting the complete information. Was also awarded as the best POC in AutoThon (A Infosys wide event).

experience.name: StoneSoup
experience.description: This is a web based application that allows users to add, edit and publish engineering data. It provides Customizable Configurations to different groups. Allows saving custom configuration locally/on the server. Data generated from Stone Soup helps in design validations and automate repetitive design engineering activities.

certifications.title: Microfost Certified Specialist
certifications.name: 70-480 Programming in HTML5 with JavaScript and CSS3
